original_title: Peggy and Fred in Hell: The Complete Cycle
overview: "Highly idiosyncratic and deeply creepy, this series as a whole – which includes passages in both film and video, sometimes shown concurrently – represents the most exciting recent work in the American avant-garde, a saga that raises questions about everything while making everything seem very strange." - Jonathan Rosenbaum
title: Peggy and Fred in Hell: The Complete Cycle
